doc: Updates the status display, which is only visible while a step is running. This is useful for providing feedback and information during long-running steps. A section progress is also available for cases where long running tasks consist of multiple tasks and you want to display sub-progress messages within the context of the larger status. Note: this is only supported when running in the Cauldron desktop application.

params.description: The status message you want to display. If left blank the previously set status message will be retained. Should you desire to remove an existing message, specify a blank string for this argument.
params.name: message

params.description: A number between zero and one that indicates the overall progress for the current status. If no value is specified, the previously assigned progress will be retained.
params.name: progress

params.description: The status message you want to display for a particular task within a long-running step. If left blank the previously set section message will be retained. Should you desire to remove an existing message, specify a blank string for this argument.
params.name: section_message

params.description: A number between zero and one that indicates the progress for the current section status. If no value is specified, the previously assigned section progress value will be retained.
params.name: section_progress

name: status
